title: Thousands of hotel workers in Southern California are on strike
description: Thousands of hotel workers in Southern California walked off the job Sunday, demanding higher pay and better benefits in what the union is calling the largest strike in its history

title: Pope’s pick to handle sex abuse allegations has refused to believe some victims, US group says
description: The Argentine archbishop has refused to believe some victims, U.S. group says.

title: Israel to buy more F-35 fighter jets from US
description: Israel says it will buy 25 F-35 aircraft from the United States

title: A tornado in the Alberta, Canada, has wrecked homes but caused no serious injuries
description: A tornado that struck near a town in the Canadian province of Alberta has wrecked homes and killed livestock, but caused no serious injuries

title: WATCH:  Robot takes stage to conduct orchestra in Seoul
description: A two-armed android robot, EveR 6, took the conductor's podium in Seoul to lead a performance by South Korea's national orchestra.

title: 3 of 9 enter pleas in burglary ring in theft of art, sports memorabilia
description: Three of nine people have pleaded guilty to federal charges in a burglary ring that authorities in northeastern Pennsylvania say stole art, sports memorabilia and other items from museums and other institutions over two decades

title: Atlanta rapper suspected of role in fatal shooting arrested, charged with murder
description: An Atlanta rapper signed to Young Thug's record label has been arrested and charged with murder for his suspected role in the fatal shooting of a man outside an apartment complex

title: Most Americans approve of SCOTUS ruling restricting use of race in college admissions
description: A little more than half of Americans – 52% -- approve of the U.S. Supreme Court decision on affirmative action.

title: 7 shot, 2 trampled in shooting at nightclub in Kansas
description: Seven people were shot and two others have been trampled after a shooting inside a nightclub in Wichita, Kansas, early Sunday morning.

title: 'Mass shooting incident' in Baltimore, police confirm multiple victims
description: A "mass shooting incident" in Baltimore has left "multiple victims" in the Brooklyn Homes neighborhood in the southern district of the city, authorities said.

title: Israel's air force attacks Syria and Syrian air defense missile explodes over northern Israel
description: Israel carried out airstrikes on areas near the central Syrian city of Homs causing material damage but no casualties, the Syrian military said in a statement

title: WATCH:  Officers rescue dog trapped in canal
description: Quick-thinking officers helped get a dog out of an Arizona canal by tempting it with some baked goods.

title: After several turbulent days, flight disruptions ease despite worries about 5G signals
description: Passengers endured tens of thousands of weather-related flight delays this week.

title: 2nd bus carrying asylum seekers from Texas arrives in Los Angeles
description: It's the second time a bus arrived in less than three weeks.

title: Ukraine prepares for possible nuclear attack with disaster drills
description: ABC News was invited to the drills in the city of Zaporizhzhia this week, about 30 miles from the plant.

title: Trump pressured former Arizona governor to flip 2020 election results: Sources
description: Trump pressured former Arizona governor Doug Ducey to overturn the Arizona 2020 presidential election results, sources said.
